mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY (SELECT EVENTTIME) DESC) AS ROWNUM ,A.DATASEQ ,A.VENDORID ,A.FACTORYID ,(SELECT FACTORYNAME FROM DSP_FACTORY WHERE FACTORYID IN (A.FACTORYID)) AS FACTORYNAME ,A.VENDORNAME ,A.VENDORNICKNAME ,A.VENDOR_ADDRESS ,A.VENDOR_CHARGEID ,A.VENDOR_CONTACTEMAIL ,A.VENDOR_CONTACTPHONENO ,A.CREATOR ,FORMAT(A.CREATETIME, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') AS CREATETIME ,A.EVENT ,A.EVENTUSER ,FORMAT(A.EVENTTIME, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') AS EVENTTIME ,A.ISUSABLE ,A.TID FROM DSP_VENDOR A WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY EVENTTIME DESC
